Skill_Experience: Job Description Technical Skills: Analytics and Modeling   Education  Strong educational background is preferred. PhD/ Masters degree in Data Science, Applied Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Operations Research or equivalent strongly preferred; MS/PhD in engineering with emphasis on applied statistics or statistical modeling or MS/PhD in Computer Science or other quantitative disciplines with emphasis in machine learning and database management in unstructured data environment (Hadoop) also considered. 	Statistical programming skills: At least two years experience applying scientific methods in the field of analytics using statistical and mathematical programming packages such as R, Python. Java, Perl, C/C++ or any other programming language is a plus.	Machine learning  Expertise in supervised and unsupervised learning using a variety of machine learning algorithms is a must. Candidate should have both theoretical and practical understanding of parametric and non-parametric classification and regression models. Experience analyzing and presenting complex data and proven problem	 solving abilities is desired.	Feature engineering and Time-Series data analysis  Candidate should showcase expertise in engineering new features to improve model prediction/inference. Experience with time-series data is highly desired.	Hadoop Platform  Experience with Hadoop, Spark, and cloud computing ecosystem/platform will be preferred. Experience with Hive, Pig, Scala and MapReduce is desired. Parallel computing experience with Spark is highly desired.	SQL Database/Coding  Candidate should be able to write and execute complex queries in SQL. 	Visualization software - Advanced skills with TIBCO Spotfire or other visualization platforms are desired.Non-Technical Skills:	Business acumen  It is expected that the candidate is able to develop strong business acumen and a solid understanding of the industry, in addition to identifying new ways the business should be leveraging its data. 	Communication skills  The data scientist we are looking for needs to clearly and fluently translate the technical findings to a non-technical team, such as the Marketing or Sales departments. Candidate must enable the business to make decisions by arming them with quantified insights, in addition to understanding the needs of their non-technical colleagues in order to wrangle the data appropriately. Job Responsibility Requirements: 	Proficient in using data analytics tools to perform queries and analyses and for defining and correlating data, and skilled at utilizing data visualization platforms to organize and present summarizations, predictive analysis, comparative analysis, dashboards and reporting.	Perform data mining and analytics to support ongoing continuous risk monitoring and risk assessments of operational data to recognize patterns and trends, investigate anomalies, and assess internal control environment. 	Help with the design and implementation of data governance processes; the assessment and remediation of data quality related issues; working with large and complex enterprise data models and large volumes of data. 	Utilize data analysis by leveraging various statistical techniques, and predictive modeling to drive and identify indicators of risk. 	Drive efficiency by automation of manual auditing processes.Please fill the require details Years of Exp :CTC:Exp CTC:Notice period :Present Location :Kindly forward your Updated CV in a word format ASAP at Shivani.Johri@falconhr.comWarm Regards,Shivani J Falcon HR Consulting Pvt Ltd 022-71600669

GTSS professionals are committed to providing the best talent shared services to the Deloitte network of member firms around the world.  We care about our customers' experience with us and strive to offer the best talent services that the industry can provide based on technology and human efforts. The Recruitment Management System (RMS)  support team within GTSS provides technology/  system support to recruiters of member firms worldwide within Deloitte network by helping them adopt & implement optimum functionality and system configuration of Taleo as a RMS tool,  administrative support to users of Taleo and regular maintenance/  upgrade of Taleo during various release cycles.  This team will act as a crucial solution provider as domain experts to various users of Taleo around the world. Qualifications Education:  B. com/ BBA/ BBM/ BCA,  Post graduate MBA or relevant business experience  Technical skills:  Solid systems skills,  expertise in candidate/ client relationship management system (CRM)  required.   Expertise with recruitment management systems a plus,  preference to Taleo Enterprise.   Advanced- level expertise in Microsoft Office Suite (PowerPoint,  Word,  Excel)  and Internet and Email.   Experience with one or more of the following reporting tools:  Microsoft Access,  Excel,  SQL,  Hyperion.    Work experience:  Minimum two years of recruiting or CRM technology system implementation,  support,  testing,  analysis and design experienceSkills Required:  Strong written and verbal communication skills (English) .   Must be an effective communicator. We want all our people to develop in their own way,  playing to their own strengths as they hone their leadership skills.  And,  as a part of our efforts,  we provide our professionals with a variety of learning and networking opportunitiesincluding exposure to leaders,  sponsors,  coaches,  and challenging assignmentsto help accelerate their careers along the way.  No two people learn in exactly the same way.  So,  we provide a range of resources including live classrooms,  team- based learning,  and eLearning.  DU:  The Leadership Center in India,  our state- of- the- art,  world- class learning Center in the Hyderabad offices is an extension of the Deloitte University (DU)  in Westlake,  Texas,  and represents a tangible symbol of our commitment to our peoples growth and development.  Explore DU:  The Leadership Center in IndiaBenefitsAt Deloitte,  we know that great people make a great organization.  We value our people and offer employees a broad range of benefits.
